revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
void '''RemoveFromHash'''()
== Usage == Sets the Actor's thing id to 0 and removes it from the internal list that keeps track of things with ids. Should be used when completely removing a thing's id is wanted. Also called when using a thing id changing function.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
